title: Nigel Kennedy - The Doors Concerto
description:
Nigel Kennedy - The Doors Conserto
The Doors (same tracks)


mp3 192 kbits

performers:
Conductor Peter Scholes
Voilin Nigel Kennedy
Prague Symphony Orchestra

Cd 1 Nigel Kennedy - The Dors Conserto

1. Riders on the Storm 

2. The Unknown Soldier

3. Spanish Caravan

4. Love Street

5. Hello, I love you

6. Light my Fire

7. People are Strange

8. Strange Days

9. The End

Cd 2 original Tracks

Music by the Doors arranged in a very exciting and imaginative way. Modern music from the West using Eastern tonic scales. "Riders on the Storm" is the highlight for me but "Light My Fire" is also first class. I'm no musician and it amazes me what can be done with relatively ordinary tunes if you have the ability of the people involved with this album. The credits seems to go to Jaz Coleman who writes of this work as a tribute to those who died or suffered in the Vietnam War.
